full_description:
Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS USM Camera Lens

The Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS USM Camera Lens is a powerful telephoto zoom lens created to work in conjunction with the EOS R system and aid in capturing distant scenes. It is perfect for portrait, wedding, and sports photography because to its small size, mobility, huge maximum aperture of f/2.8, and other advantages.

Compact and Lightweight

Canon RF 70-200mm is Canon's shortest and lightest 70-200mm f/2.8 lens. At just 2.36 pounds, it's easy to pack and carry wherever you go. The portable Canon RF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS USM Lens is an essential lens for your bag, ready to capture everything from faraway wildlife to portraits, and more.

Constant f/2.8 Aperture

Bright f/2.8 constant maximum aperture maintains consistent illumination throughout the zoom range and suits working in low-light conditions as well as affords increased control over depth of field for working with selective focus techniques. Rounded nine-blade diaphragm contributes to a pleasing bokeh quality. The front and rear elements feature a protective Fluorine coating to resist fingerprints and smudges and to make cleaning significantly easier.

Advanced Optical Design

One UD (Ultra-Low Dispersion) element and one Super UD element helps to minimize chromatic aberrations and color fringing in order to provide greater clarity and color accuracy. Two aspherical elements are used to correct spherical aberrations and distortion for improved sharpness and accurate rendering. An Air Sphere Coating (ASC) has been applied to lens elements to reduce backlit flaring and ghosting for maintained light transmission and high contrast in strong lighting conditions.

High-quality Imagery

The bright zoom with an f/2.8 max aperture delivers sharp images with beautiful background blur. A 2.3 ft. (0.7m) minimum focusing distance enables excellent versatility throughout the zoom range. Smooth and nearly silent autofocus suits both photography and video applications. Full-time manual focus control available when working in the one-shot AF mode.

Dual Nano USM AF System

This Lens uses two NANO USM focus motors—a first for Canon autofocus lenses. The floating optical system delivers enhanced close-focus performance. High-level quietness, power saving and speedy operation can all be achieved, without sacrificing a compact design. Dual Nano USM system utilizes both a ring type USM and an STM mechanism to realize quick and accurate focusing.

Optical Image Stabilization

An Optical Image Stabilizer helps to minimize the appearance of camera shake by five stops. Enables working in low-light conditions and with slower shutter speeds. There are three discrete IS modes are available: standard single-shot mode, a panning-optimized mode, and a mode that only activates the Image Stabilizer during the exposure.

Rugged, Weather-Resistant Design

Weather-resistant design protects against dust and moisture to enable use in inclement conditions. L-Series level vibration shock resistance in the lens barrel, helping to maintain focus and settings even in turbulent situations.

Canon RF 24-105mm f/4-7.1 IS STM Camera Lens

The Canon RF 24-105mm f/4-7.1 IS STM Camera Lens is intended to be not only small and light, but also a very flexible lens with a macro function that won't be heavy when shooting. reasonably priced for transitioning to full-frame mirrorless to increase their creative options. For EOS R Series cameras, the Canon RF 24-105mm f/4-7.1 IS STM Lens is a small, lightweight lens with a flexible zoom range that makes it easy to capture a variety of subjects. With a maximum magnification of 0.5x and Center Macro Focus, it is especially helpful to take pictures from as close as one inch away. Designed for EOS R series cameras, this compact and lightweight lens offers a flexible zoom range, excellent close-up focusing including 0.5x maximum magnification, and smooth autofocusing, thanks to a leadscrew-type STM motor.

Perfect for Landscapes, Portraits, Travel, and More

Canon RF 24-105mm Camera Lens is a perfect pair with the EOS RP that provides top-notch quality in a compact size. The lens extends and retracts when it is zoomed. A dramatically compact lens, Canon RF 24-105mm f/4-7.1 IS STM Lens packs a broad zoom range and a bright maximum aperture into a well-balanced, refined design that balances comfortably on EOS R series cameras. The mechanism of the lens makes for lightweight and comfortable usage for day-to-day movement.

Versatile Focal Length

Being able to have a wide angle and a medium telephoto within one zoom lens provides plenty of composition opportunities to express the best of what is expected. It measures 76.6mm in diameter and 88.8mm in long when fully retracted. Weighing only at 880g, it is smaller and lighter compared to the RF24-105mm f/4L IS USM.

Ideal Zoom Range for All-day Photography

This Camera Lens comes with a zoom range covering macro-like, wide angle, normal, and telephoto, that excels in a variety of shooting situations, offering amazing versatility with the turn of a zoom ring. It has a Center Focus Macro function that allows minimum focusing of approximately 13cm from the sensor which is approximately 2.5cm from the lens, providing a 0.5x magnification at 24mm with manual focus. When shooting at 105mm, it's very convenient to achieve a 0.4x magnification in both autofocus and manual focus with a minimum focusing distance of approximately 34cm. With a minimum focusing distance of 0.66 ft./0.20m and a maximum magnification of approx. 0.4x, the Canon RF 24-105mm f/4-7.1 IS STM Lens is capable of capturing detailed images from various distances. Whether shooting portraits or still life, the lens can easily provide sharp images with minimal distortion. Also, this lens is ideal for capturing a variety of subjects at a close ratio.

Dual Sensing Imaging Stabilization

The Canon RF 24-105mm Camera Lens supports Dual Sensing Image Stabilization, which utilizes information from the gyro sensors within the lens and image data from the CMOS image sensor within the camera body to achieve a stunning image stabilization of up to 5 shutter speed stop. This would mean that it is much easier to take sharp image handheld at shutter speed previously not possible.

Optical Image Stabilization at up to 5 Stops of Shake Correction

This Canon RF 24-105mm Camera Lens is designed to work in conjunction with EOS R series cameras, with both the camera and the lens sharing data to dramatically reduce camera-shake blur, regardless of the situation, whether shooting video or stills. With up to 5 stops of stabilization, it delivers impressively clear results. Capture fast-moving subjects without missing a moment by combining the leadscrew-type STM with the EOS R series Dual Pixel autofocus system to achieve high-speed, high-precision focus.

Control Ring for Direct Setting Changes

RF 24-105mm Lens incorporates a control ring on the lens barrel that can directly adjust numerous settings including shutter speed, aperture, exposure compensation, and more. Located towards the front of the lens, the control ring has a tactile, easily distinguished surface that provides tangible feedback for confident use while looking through the viewfinder.

In-camera Digital Lens Optimizer

The EOS R system's 12-pin communication system enables the Digital Lens Optimizer, which works in-camera to combat aberrations and image deterioration, especially in the edges of the image frame when shooting at a large aperture. Data from the Canon RF 24-105mm f/4-7.1 IS STM Lens is transferred automatically to the camera body, facilitating near-immediate correction for clear, detailed images.

Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens

The Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Camera Lens is a high-quality standard zoom lens for multiple feature-rich functions. The lens's wide zoom range is suitable for most general photography, with a focal length equivalent of 29-88mm in 35mm format. Throughout the zoom range, the working distance for close-up work is only 0.25m (25cm).

Various camera functionality

The Canon EF-S 18-55mm Camera Lens incorporates Canon’s four-stop Image Stabilizer technology to minimize risk of image blur. This allows to use shutter speeds up to four times slower than usual with no discernible increase in image blur, making it ideal for low-light shooting. The 28.8-88mm equivalent focal length compact standard zoom lens is designed for APS-C format Canon EF-S mount DSLRs. The optical image stabilizer reduces the appearance of camera shake by up to four shutter speed stops, allows to work in low-light conditions and with slower shutter speeds.

Aspherical lens element with Super Spectra coating

By absorbing light reflected off digital camera sensors or internal lens elements, Super Spectra coatings prevent ghosting and flare in addition to ensuring true color balance and sharp, high contrast images. Even with the aperture wide open, an aspherical lens element produces images with sharp details and high contrast. A circular aperture diaphragm provides a smooth, even blur to the background for shots taken at wide apertures, which helps to highlight foreground subjects and eliminate distractions. One aspherical element is used inside the Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens to lessen distortion and spherical aberrations throughout the zoom range while maintaining sharpness and clarity.

Handy accessories

Canon EF-S 18-55mm Camera Lens is supplied with a lens cap and dust cap. A lens hood (EW-60C) and lens soft case (LP814) are available as optional accessories. Only environmentally-friendly, lead-free glass is used in the construction of the Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens. Also, rounded six-blade diaphragm contributes to a pleasing out of focus quality that benefits the use of shallow depth of field and selective focus techniques.
